text:
Sorry for the sudden interruption. It's just that there's
quite a good sense of tension before the performance.

Capturing it in a photo could make for a nice memory,
and later, you might even use it as material for Twesta.

Oh, thank you... I'm sorry,
Producer-san, you're busy too...

Nah, it's fine. At this point,
my job is mainly watching!

...It's about time.
Enjoy flying to your heart's content, Mano.

To all the fans,
to the staff who supported us,

And to you, Producer-san,
I hope you all think today's live was great.
I'll do my very best, I promise!
